40015001	Ema aupe Parisi ita anaana waeuwalala isiwa Ierusalemwae Iesu mampe wimone waitarasane waienase,
40015002	“Dima baiwa e waawo alala no apanamba eiau waeuwau ampuiasaie witapu mai mitamoipe nana naipona, tane di nana nai?”
40015003	Iesu mo wawu gagalowa waieno etene sipoamone wanase, “E epe wailana, tane ne e diaidaledina e God anaanawaida ampuiasaile eueuwa onape os dewamoile apana banlakadisamoilana. E dima baiwa epe dewaitilana?
40015004	God anaanawa bedewe wadi wadiase, ‘E mamaa ita inaa do oniadewasamona,’ ita do wadiase, ‘Mida me mamba ba inawa dabuamodie wakadisamodia, me epapubolepi.’
40015005	-
40015006	God anaanawa epe wade, tane e God anaanawa waeuwakadisaitile apana banlakadisamoilana. Apana da mamba ba inawa oniadewasamopia baiwa nitu da mampe winedia wadedie mamba ba inawa wanepia menasade, tane e waeuwala asiasi meba wadi wadiase, ‘Ne nitu ema mai gombana enalepaa rua, dia, ne God baiwa pulonteapa.’ E apana epe insaisaleidio adiweitile wailanase dima me dewasapia mampe mai God anaanawa aneipapundeipona, dia. E epe dewaitile mampe apana banlakadisamoilano God aiawa eie e waeuwala wawentoi. E dewala sa mampe God aiawa ipasiasailana.
40015007	E lagawaauida! God peroweta Aisaia bukawa bedewe e umanala wandewalene wanase,
40015008	‘Apana ema aiau os mampe ne eunei, tane mo nuau ipa nambeido, mai ne mainawo.
40015009	Mo ne di wadaposinei, mo apanaida anaanau waeuwantoia abo God anaanawa rua.’”
40015010	Tauma Iesu apana uara sape eneia apamono mampe wimono diamone wanase, “Parisi ita anaana waeuwalala wita mitamita dewawa baiwa nuau pola wade. Tane ema etane ateitana:
40015011	Mai nitu da apana moawe iepe apana miramirasaipona, dia. Tane dima apana nuawa bedewe winedie moawe nosedia, sa ipa apana miramirasade.”
40015012	Mape wawe alala Iesu mampe wimone wane waienase, “E ateiten ba dia, epe waie Parisi apanawa nuau kadisaiana.”
40015013	Me sipoamone wanase, “Nitu anala uduudu dima ne Mamana uboo wandia mai ampona me bowiamopi.
40015014	Parisi apanawa emona, mo muba emau potau tane sosou banlamoi. Apana emawa potawa me sowa emawa potawa banlepia mo nata ampusue don bedewe antopu.”
40015015	Ita Pita wane wanase, “Gagalo babawa ema ipawaida wadewasanea!”
40015016	Iesu mo waitaramone wanase, “E do mai dima ateitipe wanleipona, ba?
40015017	E eweilana, ba dia, dima apana nadio bupa bedewe iedia etepa edie nosedie nambe aleide.
40015018	Tane dima apana nuawe winedie moawe nosedia, sa ipa apana miramirasade.
40015019	Apana nuau bedewe insaisa kadiwa nosedia baiwa mo sosou bomoi, nina dewawa rebareba dewasai, pointoi, lagantoi ita kutuntoi.
40015020	Dewa ema uduudu apana miramirasade, tane mo waia rua apana witapa mitasiawaia nana wadepie napia, sa mai apana miramirasapia rua, dia.”
40015021	Tane Iesu Israel tawowa ene Taire ita Saidon bolau kerakera bedeuwointa alen.
40015022	Sape i dea wisene mukama Iesu apasane wane wanase, “Tatana, Dawid Otopa, nuaparenaitaa! Aleu kadiwa ne anona bedewe wandie dewasadio pokaida etede, mai rua!” Tane i sa mai Israel iwa, me bola Kanaan bedewe wanwanlala.
40015023	Tane Iesu mai i aiawa da sipoasapona, dia. Tauma wawe alala Iesu mampe wimone diane waienase, “I sa waaubewo alepi, me no wambo odedie aia uara wamode.”
40015024	Iesu sipoamone wanase, “Ne Israel apanawa os baibu waaubaneno winen, mo ipa sipsip rebalala ruau waimoi.”
40015025	Tauma i sa Iesu mampelene imimpa emmisilene wanase, “Tatana, saunea!”
40015026	Iesu leusane wanase, “Mai eulepona no seda nanau wadate mo elou wanamoto napu.”
40015027	I leusane wanase, “Tatana, sa ipa ulaipa, tane elo do mambu nana nadia karamba du atowe nosedia nai.”
40015028	Mape Iesu i diene wanase, “Anona, e sumanaia ipa debama! Dima e iririwaitena ideita segalepi.” Iesu epe diedioma me anoopa tauwadea os inalen.
40015029	Ema aupe Iesu bola sa ene doa Galili tampeinta aleidie ita wadiwa odene aisidene wain.
40015030	Sape apana uaraia mo sosou kero daitada wadawadalala, mo isiwa tampu bobopa, da emau potau, da etepu kiokiou ita do moau potau banlamone wimone Iesu wawa bumpe teamoieno me inamon.
40015031	Tane apana moau potau inantone gagalontoiena, etepu kiokiou euntoiena, tampu bobopa antoiena ita emau potau sala eweio apana sape eneia ewamone memesantone Israel Godiwa wadaposisaiena.
40015032	Iesu me wawe alala apamono me mampe wimono diamone wanase, “Ne nuana pareleide apana ema baibu, ipawa walama natadea mo ne do lakasanten ita tauma mai nana da wineipona napu. Ne mai menaneipona mo omanaomanaua waaubamopo bolauwobolauwo antompe into emau dubalepi.”
40015033	Wawe alala Iesu diane waienase, “Bola sawanawaida, ambi dauwa ema bedewe bured donsate apana uaraia wanamoto napu?”
40015034	Iesu waitaramone wanase, “E manlawo bured uduudu ambi winei?” Mo sipoasane waienase, “No mainimbo bured 7 ita bouri kerakera nata os winei.”
40015035	Ema aupe Iesu apana diamono dogo osowe aisintone waimoiena.
40015036	Tauma me bured 7 ita bouri do otene God auwasano dialeno ampuialene me wawe alala wanamon, mo apana mampo amonantopuo napua baiwa.
40015037	Mo uduudu nana sa nane pokamon. Tane wawe alala nana moawa eiena posawa 7 aimoieno nope wimon.
40015038	Apana mona wisiawa uduudu 4000, tane ioto obampu do sape nana naiena mai wisiamopona, dia.
40015039	Apana nana naieno dialeno tauma Iesu mo waaubamono anton ita me waa bedewe odene doa nawene bola Magadaniwa alen.
40016001	Parisi ita Sadusi apanawa isiwa Iesu rubusapua baiwa mampe wimone waitarasane waienase, “Ginasa dewasawo ewata e ulaipa God mukawa wadaana!”
40016002	Me sipoamone wanase, “Rawileidio e wailanase, ‘Sala bumede, imonepi omo debama ipi.’
40016003	Ita tadinaida e wailanase, ‘Giou odedie dubaleidia ando unu wapi.’ E dima uba tampe emalawo eweile ateitilana, tane dima baiwa ande walamawa bedewe eueuwa segaleidio e eweile tane ipawaida mai ateitipona?
40016004	Walama ande apanawa ginasa ewapua baiwa banusai, tane mo kadiwaida dewasaie ewaninantoi. E mai ginasa da ewana rua, diaida. Tane eueuwa dea os e bedelawo segalepio ewana. Eueuwa sa segalepio ewana dima mapo Iona mampe segalena rua.” Iesu epe wane mo emone alen.
40016005	Tauma Iesu wawe alala do doa Galili nawane antoie tane wawe alala mai bured insepe wadapona.
40016006	Intasino Iesu diamone wanase, “Parisi ita Sadusi apanawa nanau da kerauda ist parawa bedewe ituio sasanaleidia mampe ewanadewaitana.”
40016007	Iesu wawe alala me gagalowa etane ipawaida banusaie muba eda gagalontoie waienase, “Dauwa Iesu no bured wadasiantena umanawa wade.”
40016008	Iesu mo dima umanawa waia atenlene ita mo waitaramone wanase, “E sumanaila kerauda! Dima baiwa e bured wadasiaitena umanawa wailana?
40016009	E walama daumawa ne do leitana, tane e ideita mai ateitipona! E inseilana, ba dia, walamaipa ne bured 5 wadane apana 5000 wanamona e nana moawa eiena posawa uduudu ambi nopemolana?
40016010	Tane do walamaipa ne bured 7 otene apana 4000 wanamono naiena e nana sa moawa posawa uduudu ambi nopemolana?
40016011	E inseilana abo ne buredida umanawa e manlawo wape waponase, ‘Parisi ita Sadusi apanawa nanau ist parawa bedewe ituio sasanaleidia mampe ewanadewaitana!’”
40016012	Tauma mo etane atendewanton Iesu mai nana ist umanawa wapona, tane me Parisi ita Sadusi apanawa waeuwau umanawa wan.
40016013	Iesu Sisaria Pilipai tampainta bola kerakera bedewainta wisen. Ita me wawe alala waitaramone wanase, “Dianeano etapo, Apana Otopa umanawa apana ambi wai me mida?”
40016014	Mo sipoasane waienase, “Apana isiwa waiase e ipa Ion Babatutu bo bedewe enaawiena, isiwa waia e ipa Elaia, tane da wai e ipa Ieremaia ba peroweta tontau bedeuwo dea.”
40016015	Mape Iesu waitaramone wanase, “Tane e ne umanana ambi wailana ne mida?”
40016016	Saimon Pita sipoalene wanase, “E ipa Keriso Inawamba, Godida wanwankasalala Otopa.”
40016017	Iesu me sipoasane wanase, “Saimon Iona otopa, e sau euda donsana nuaa eulempa! Insaisa ema mai apanaida mampe e nuaawo odapono wapona, dia, tane ne Mamana uboo wandia insaisa ema eneen.
40016018	Tauma ne ema epe dieedina: E ipa Pita, ebo sa ipawaida ipa seu, ita seu sa osowe ne ekelesiana wadapa. Bo mukawa ita muka da mai mukau wineipona ando ekelesia kadisapua rua, diaida.
40016019	Ne e God gonaawa kiwa eneedina, dima e tawo osowe anaanasaiana, sa ipa uboo do anaanasade, ita dima e tawo osowe wadeiaubeiana, sa ipa uboo do wadediaubede.”
40016020	Ita Iesu me wawe alala gagalo badowa mampe diamone wanase, “Mai apana da diana ne ipa Keriso God sauawalena, dia.”
40016021	Walama sawo Iesu uwaalene wawe alala sabamo waeuwamodie wanase, “Ne God insaisawa ituna rua Ierusalemwa odape anteapa ita poka daitada apana eiau, pirisi debamau ita anaana waeuwalala mampo etaidasapa. Mo ne boneapu tane walama natadeawo ne bo bedewe enapawineapa.”
40016022	Mape Pita Iesu banlene nambesane badowa diene wanase, “Tatamba, God sauwa mampe dewa inainamba ema mai segalepi e manawo.”
40016023	Iesu leulentue Pita diene wanase, “Seitan, nambe aitaa! E ne intana bodeiana, ipawa e insaisaa ema mai God mampea tane apanaida mampea!”
40016024	Sape Iesu me wawe alala diamone wanase, “Me mida ne warorona menasampa mai meba insaisawa wadepi, diaida. Tane dima uduudu nuawa teinedia dabuamopie emopituwapi. Ita meba korosiwa, sa ipa poka saiwa God ituna awanepi.
40016025	Tane apana mida meba inawawa wadediitudedia me inawawa rebaidasapi, tane apana mida meba inawawa edie ne bainaleidia me inaida donsapie wankasalepi.
40016026	Naita apana da tawo manewa uduudu ita ewanuauwa daitada otamodie mampemodie boleidia dima euwa tawo ewanuauwa sa bedewe donsapie wadepi? Me tawo ewanuauwa sa do awanamopie alepie nitu sa mampe inawawa gimaralepie leusapie wadepi, ba? Di diaida!
40016027	Ne epe wadina, ipawa Apana Otopa me Mamba sapawa ita me enseliwa sapau do leulepi wisepie ita apana deadea dima dewasana rua unewa wanamopi.
40016028	Ne ulaipa dialedina, apana isiwa e bedelawo mape eneia Apana Otopa me gonaawa bedewe wisepio ewapu, mo mai ewasasia waimompe di bontopu, dia.”
40017001	Ema aupe walama 6 diantono Iesu me wawe alala bedeuwo Pita, Iems ita me wamba Ion otamone muba os wadi debama iwe banlamone odane anton.
40017002	Sape wimone tauma Iesu mo danauwo inainamba leulene da segalen ita me namba sapa wan omo sapawa rua. Ita me garawa do kibokiboralene sapaida wan.
40017003	Tauma wawe alala natadea sape eneio Moses Elaia nata segantone Iesu do gagalontoio ewamoiena.
40017004	Ita Pita Iesu diene wanase, “Tatamba, ide dewantene bola ema euda bedewe winen. E meneempa ne ape natadea wadamopa, dea e baia, dea Moses baiwa ita da Elaia baiwa.”
40017005	Pita gagaloleidioma giou sapusapua aisidene nosene mo taubodamono ita giou bedewe aia segalene wanase, “Ema ipa ne nuawadawadana Otopaida, nuana eusadio wainedina. Me aiawa etanadewaitana!”
40017006	Wawe alala aia ema etane saidantone mo imimpu emmisintone dunenton.
40017007	Tane Iesu mo mampo wisene ibubu wadene diamone wanase, “Enana, mai saitana!”
40017008	Mo enane pisiwane tane Iesu meba enedio eweiena, mai mida da, dia.
40017009	Tauma mo wadi iwe leuntone ieie into Iesu diamone wanase, “Dima e ewalana mai apana da benemamono etapu, dia. Tane Apana Otopa bo bedewe enepiwisepio tauma benemaitano apana atentopu.”
40017010	Sape wawe alala Iesu waitarasane waienase, “Dima baiwa anaana waeuwalala waie waiase, ‘Peroweta Elaia bauta wisepio wawe Keriso mida God saualena wisepi?’”
40017011	Iesu sipoamone wanase, “Elaia ideita bauta wisepi ita nitu uduudu aupo teadewasamopie imaamopi.
40017012	Ne dialedina Elaia aitamana wisen, tane mo me mai atensapona, tane mo insaisau rua dewasane me bosaiena. Deawaa Apana Otopa pokaida etepi mo mampo.”
40017013	Wawe alala aia ema etane atentoiena dima Iesu Elaia umanawa wana, sa ipa me Ion Babatutu umanawa wadie.
40017014	Mo wadiwae leuntone iane apana uara mampo nomono apana dea Iesu mampelene imimpa emmisilene
40017015	wane wanase, “Tatamba, ne otona nuaparewaitaa, me walamawa wisedio uwawa koakoaleide ita poka debama etede. Me guriboboleidie ia iilala ita esa bedewe omedie aleide.
40017016	Ne me banlene e waawo alala mampo winene iririmona inasapona baiwa, tane mo rubusanalewanton.”
40017017	Iesu leusane wanase, “Walama ande apanawa ambi e sumanaisiawaiaida, insaisala do kiokiowa! Mapo os e ne do wankasantene dialedino os wainilee, tane mai sumanaitapona, dia! E baila ne poka etaidasadina. E aitane oto sa banlene mainawo winlena!”
40017018	Mo oto kerola banlene wimono Iesu aiawa badowa mampe aleu kadiwa taneno nosene alen ita oto tauwadea os inalen.
40017019	Ema aupe wawe alala Iesu mampe wimone werego waitarasane waienase, “Dima baiwa no aleu kadiwa mai tanapona rua?”
40017020	-
40017021	Me sipoamone wanase, “E sumanaila kerauda baiwa mai tanana rua, dia. Ne ulaipa dialedina sumanai mampe dewa uduudu e dewasana rua. Naita e sumanaila paipai naumba kerauda rua manlawo winompa e rua os wadi ema diane wanase, ‘Riaite sisi aitaa,’ ruawa me rialepi.”
40017022	Iesu wawe alala do Galili bedewe auweieno tauma Iesu mo diamone wanase, “Apana Otopa mo laga mampe nanantopue apana witaposapuo
40017023	bosapu. Tane walama natadeawo me bo bedewe enepiwisepi.” Me wawe alala aia ema etane nuau pareidalen.
40017024	Iesu wawe alala do Kapeanaum bedewe wimoio God duwa manewa tamalala dea Pita mampe wisene waitarasane wanase, “E debamala God duwa manewa itude, ba dia?”
40017025	Pita me sipoasane wanase, “Oa, me mane itude.” Pita du bedewe odeno Iesu Pita waitarasane wanase, “Saimon, e ambi inseiana? Tawo warereu apana dainea mampo mane wadei? Mo muba apanau mampo ba bola da apanawa mampo?”
40017026	Pita leusane wanase, “Bola da apanawa mampo, mai muba apanau.” Iesu me sipoasane wanase, “E waadewaiten, warere bolawa apanawa mai mane itupu, dia.
40017027	Tane no mai menaneipona God duwa manewa tamalala apanawa nuawa kadisata. Sa baiwa doa tampe aitee kaimoitaa, ita bouri bauta teinea moawa wadaake bedewe mane nepa dea donsaa. Mane nepa sa rualepio God duwa manewa tamalala wanamoa e ne nata baimba.”
40018001	Walama sawo Iesu wawe alala wimone me waitarasane waienase, “Mida ipa debamawaida God gonaawa bedewe?”
40018002	Iesu gagalo ema etene oto kerauda apasane mo sawanauwosane euwamone wanase,
40018003	“Ne ulaipa dialedina, mai mida God gonaawa bedewe odepia rua, dia! Dea os, mida insaisawa uduudu leusadie oto kerauda ruawaleidia me ipa God gonaawa bedewe odepi.
40018004	Ita mida oto ema rua meba molaaisileidia me ipa debamawaida God gonaawa bedewe.
40018005	Mida sowa ebowasiawaia oto kerauda ema rua ne ebonawo wadedie mampesadie simbiasadia, me ipa ne wadanedie mampesadie simbianede.”
40018006	“Apana mida seda kerakera bedeuwo dea ne mainawo sumanaileidia dewasapio sumanaiwa dialepia, me ipa matangelawa debamaia donsapi. Epe segalepia sawa eulena apana sa gadompawe seu debama taupadoe owa bedewe aubepono alepona.
40018007	Ambi kadiwa rebarebaida tawo apanawa baibu mo mida sumanailala banlakadisamoio sumanaibu eie omeia. Dewa ema ideita segantopu, tane ambi kadiwa rebarebaida apana mida dewa ema dewamoio segantoia mampo.
40018008	Naita e witaa ba waa banlaepio kadi dewasae sumanaia bedewe omea tauwadea topuiamoe aubamoa! E witaa ba waa dea os do inawinakasalawo odaa, sa ide. Tane mai ide e witaa ita waa nata do ia iilalawo aitaa!
40018009	Naita e emaa banlaepio kadi dewasae sumanaia bedewe omea tauwadea enasopoe aubea! E emaa dea os do God gonaawa bedewe odaa, sa ide. Tane mai ide e emaa nata do bola kadiwa bedewe aubaepu.”
40018010	-
40018011	“E ewanadewaitana ita mai oto kerauda da ewanadabuasana, ipawa ne dialedina ensel mo oniamoia walama uduudu ne Mamana uboo wandia danawe enei.
40018012	E ambi inseilana, naita apana dea sipsip 100 gamomoipe, tane dea os nambe alepie rebalepio me dima dewasapi? Me ideita sipsip 99 wadi sainape emopie rebala dea banuwa alepi.
40018013	Ne ulaipa dialedina, me sipsip sa donsapie nuawa eudidalepi sipsip sa baiwa, mai sipsip 99 isiwa waimoidewantoia rua.
40018014	Deawaa, e Mamala uboo wandia mai menasaipona oto da kerauda nambe alepie rebalepi, dia.”
40018015	“Naita e sumanai soa e manawo kadi dewasapia, me nata gagaloitane kadi sa euwasaa. Me e asisuepia, sa ipa e soa kadi bedewe leusaana.
40018016	Me e mai asisuepia apana dea ba nata do me mampe aitane me do gagaloitana. Inta ema bedewe gagalo uduudu benema apana nata ba natadea mampe ulaipalepi buka bedewe girumalena rua.
40018017	Naita mo do mai asisumopia ekelesia uduudu mampo me kadiwa gagalowa benemaitaa. Tane ekelesia me gagalosapuo mai etepie ruawalepia tauma me dewasaa ewaewawa abo me takis manewa tamalala lagawaau ba apana ebou kadiwa wawalala ruau.
40018018	Ne ulaipa dialedina, dima e tawo osowe anaanasailana, sa ipa uboo do anaanasade, ita dima e tawo osowe wadeilaaubeilana, sa ipa uboo do wadediaubede.
40018019	Tane do ne dialedina, apana nata e bedelawo insaisau dealepio dima umanawa iririwantompa, ne Mamana uboo wandia etamopie ideita mo baibu dewasapi.
40018020	Ne epe wadina, ipawa sumanai apanawa nata ba natadea ne ebonawo auweia sape mo bedeuwo ne do.”
40018021	Mape Pita Iesu mampelene waitarasane wanase, “Tatamba, sumanai sona mainawo kadi dewasapia walama uduudu ambi ne me kadiwa insepadabuasapa? Walama uduudu 7 ide, ba?”
40018022	Iesu sipoasane wanase, “Mai walama 7 os, dia! Walama 7 ita osoweosowe soa kadiwa inseadabuasaa, tane mai ea, walama uduudu kadiwa insenadabuasana!
40018023	E ema epe waitaraneana baiwa ne gagalo babawa ema dialedina. God gonaawa ema epe rua: Warere debama dea menasana me sauwa apanawa nolau ewepie atenlepi mo mane onieidewantoi, ba dia.
40018024	Me nolawa sa uwaaleidio mo apana dea banleieno warere mampe wisen. Apana sa mane debamaia, mai mida malesalepia rua, me warerewa mampe wadene tane mai sipoasape wanapona, dia.
40018025	Tane tauma me mampe mai mane da wineipona ita warere sipoasapie wanepi. Sa baiwa warere me nolawa dewalala diamone wanase, ‘Apana ema, manainapa obampa do, ita uduudu me mampea do otene gimaramone ita mane sa wadane ne neana.’
40018026	Tauma sau apanawa sa epe etene warere danawe imimpa emmisilene iririlene wanase, ‘Nuaparenaitaa, walama dawo mane donsape tauma uduudu sipoaepa!’
40018027	Mape warere me nuaparewalene insendabuasane diene wanase, ‘Ne sauena, ee aitaa, mai mane sa sipoanea, dia.’
40018028	Ita apana sa warere ene nosene aleidie me nola sowa da into donsan. Me sowa sa mane kerauda insadabualala me mampe wadene ita mai sipoasapona. Me sowa sa wadene imumba wadendoe diene wanase, ‘Tauwadea manena sipoasaa!’
40018029	Mape apana sa imimpa emmisilene iririsane wanase, ‘Nuaparenaitaa, walama dawo mane donsape tauma ne uduudu sipoaepa!’
40018030	Tane me dabualene diene wanase, ‘Ne menanedia e tauma manena sipoasaa, mai ando, dia!’ Ita me sowa kotusane diburasan me ideita manewa sipoasapie tauma dibura epie nosepi alepi.
40018031	Tane warere sauwa apanawa isiwa dewa ema ewane nuau siga wano warere mampe antone ema uduudu umanawa dieiena.
40018032	Mape warere sauwa apanawa mida me bauta mane debamaia sausane insendabuasana apasano odeno diene wanase, ‘E sau apanawa kadiwaida, e iririneano baiwa sauene mane debamaia wadaana insenadabuasana.
40018033	E nola soa da do nuaparewaitapona ne e nuapareantena rua.’
40018034	Warere nuawa kadiidaleno ita sau apanawa sa dibura onioniala witaposan poka etepia baiwa. Me sape waimpe mane uduudu sipoasapitue tauma me nosepi alepi.”
40018035	Iesu gagalo babawa ema diasane wane wanase, “Insenadewaitana, naita e mai nuala uduudu mampe sola kadiwa insenadabuasana ne Mamana uboo wandia deawaa dewasapi e manlawo.”
40019001	Iesu gagalo ema uduudu diasane Galili ene Iudia bedewainta esa Ioadan waiwa dawo alen.
40019002	Apana uaraia me warorosane antoiena, ita mo bedeuwo kerolala isiwa me inamon.
40019003	Sape Parisi isiwa wimone gagalo mampe Iesu rubusaiena me wapakadisapono wawusapona baiwa. Mo Iesu diane waienase, “E no dianewo etato no anaanamba ambi wade, apana manainapa nitu da kadisapio baiwa me dabuasapie epia intawa da winede, ba dia?”
40019004	Iesu sipoamone wanase, “Buka bedewe e wisiaitene ateiten, ba dia, God bumpeido apana mona ita i auwepue waimompaa baiwa dewamone teamon. Mai nambenambe waimompaa baiwa teamopona, dia.
40019005	Ita God wane wanase, ‘Ne apana mona ita iwoa dewamona, ipawa ema baiwa apana mona me mamba ita inawa do emopie i mampelepi. Ita mo nata deaidantopue ete dea os waimompa.’
40019006	God nainai bedewe apana mona ita i deaidamono waimoi, sa baiwa mo mai empuempuntopue nata segantopua intawa da wineipona, diaida!”
40019007	Mape mo Iesu waitarasane waienase, “Tane dima baiwa Moses epe girumalene wanase, ‘Apana manainapa epia menasampa me manainapa epia gagalowa girumalepie sowa wanepie wapiaubepio alepi bolawe.’”
40019008	Iesu sipoamone wanase, “E nuala badoidaleno baiwa Moses anaana ema epe girumalene ituno e ruawaitilana. Tane God bumpeido uba ita tawo dewasanawo me mai epe insepona, diaida.
40019009	Ne dialedina, apana mida me manainapa dabuasadi edie tane i da naisedia, me ipa ninaleide. Tane i bauta nosene alene apana da nata ninanton, epe segalena baiwa apana i epio alepia rua.”
40019010	Wawe alala gagalo ema etane Iesu diane waienase, “Naita dewa inainamba ema epe apana i nata mampo winompa, eulena mo mai nainaintopu.”
40019011	Iesu sipoamone wanase, “Gagalo ema badowa mai apana uduudu etapua rua, tane mo mida insaisau wanamona, mo etapua rua.
40019012	Ema epe baiwa apana isiwa mai nainaintopua rua: Apana isiwa mo epe muwantona baiwa mai nainaintopu, tane isiwa apana mo etepu nomone kadimoiena baiwa mai nainaintopu, ita isiwa God gonaawa baiwa mai nainaintopu. Mida gagalo ema etaeta menasapia me etepi.”
40019013	Apana otooto kerakera banlamone Iesu mampe wimoiena me witapa osouwo itupie ita mo baibu rauparilepia baiwa. Wawe alala mo epe dewantoio ewamone apana onau wane bodamoiena.
40019014	Mo epe dewantoio Iesu wane wanase, “Otooto kerakera emono ne mainawo wimpu, mai enabodamona, ipawa God gonaawa ipa otooto kerakera ema ruau mampoa.”
40019015	Ita me witapa mo osouwo ituno dialeno bola sa ene alen.
40019016	Apana dea Iesu mampelene waitarasane wanase, “Debamamba, ne dewa dainea euwa dewasape inawinakasala donsapa?”
40019017	Iesu me sipoasane wanase, “Dima baiwa e dewa euwa waitarawaneiana? God me meba os euda, mai mida da. E inawinakasala meneempa God anaanawa ruawaitaa.”
40019018	Me sipoasane wanase, “Anaana dainea ne ruawanteapa umanawa waiana?” Iesu me diene wanase, “Soa mai bosaa, mai ninaitaa, mai poitaa, mai lagaitaa,
40019019	mamaa ita inaa oniadewasamoe aiau ruauitona, tane do sosoa tanawoa nuawadawadamona e eba nuawadawadaitiana rua.”
40019020	Mape apana sanaa wane wanase, “Ne anaana ema uduudu ruawantentuwan, dima enanosiden?”
40019021	Iesu leusane wanase, “E dodomanaidaitaa meneempa aite dima manawo wineia gimaramoe manewa wadee apana nuaparelala wanamoa. E epe dewaitawo uboo mauraa debamalepi. Ne aiana ema ruawaite dewasae tauma wanawo winea.”
40019022	Apana sanaa gagalo ema etene puraiwawa uaraia osowe mauraleidie wandia insamone nuawa pareidaleno ene alen.
40019023	Ita Iesu wawe alala diamone wanase, “Ne ulaipa dialedina, maura apanawa God gonaawa bedewe odaodawa badowaida.
40019024	Ne dialedina, pue debamaia ebowa Kamel mai selau nagawa bedewe odepia rua, dia. Deawaa, apana puraiwa insaisawaleidia, me mai God gonaawa bedewe odepia rua, diaida.”
40019025	Wawe alala inseia puraiwa apanawa God sauwa euda donsaie baiwa maurantoie waimoia God gonaawa bedewe odapua rua. Tane mo gagalo ema etane memesaidantone waitarantone waienase, “Ema ambi, apana da inalepia intawa da winede, ba dia?”
40019026	Ita Iesu mo diadewasamone wanase, “Apana mampo mai inantopona intawa da wineipona, dia, tane God mampe inta wadaaubala winede, ipawa me dewa uduudu dewasapia rua.”
40019027	Pita sipoasane wanase, “No nitu uduudu emote e waawo leitana! Tauma dima no baimba winedia wadata?”
40019028	Iesu mo diamone wanase, “Ne ulaipa dialedina, nitu uduudu sanaalempaa walamawa osowe Apana Otopa kolaiwatawa sapawaida bedewe waimpo e mida ne waroronealana do kolaiwata 12 osouwo waine ita Israel apanawa dambu uduudu 12 oniamona.
40019029	Ita apana mida duwa, tatatawa, wanwamba, weaweanapa, mamba, inawa, obampa ba iraiwa ne baina emodia me ando dima emona ruawalepie uaraia eiasampe otempa ita do inawinakasala donsapi.
40019030	Ewane, mo mida Gagalo euda muriwa os eteie sumanaintoia God gonaawa bedewe bautantopue odapu. Tane mo mida Gagalo euda bautantone etane atentoiena muriwantopue God gonaawa bedewe odapu.”
40020001	Iesu wane wanase, “God gonaawa ipa ema epe: Irai apanawa dea tadinaida apana auweia bolawe alene apana isiwa dommone diamona wimopue me baiwa wain iraiwa bedewe nolantopu.
40020002	Me mo diamona walama sa dea bedewe nolantopua mane nepa deadea wadapu. Me epe diamono dialeno waaubamono nola awa wain iraiwa bedewe antoiena.
40020003	Mo nolantoio omo tontaleno wain iraiwa apanawa osowe apana auweia bolawe alene apana isiwa di enakoantoio dommon.
40020004	Ita me mo diamone wanase, ‘Ne menanedia e do aitane ne baina wain iraiwa bedewe nolaitano malesadewalepa.’
40020005	Mo me epe diamona ruawantone wain iraiwa bedewe nolantopua baiwa anton. Mo auwene nolantoie laio enautaleno irai apanawa osowe apana auweiawo alene apana isiwa diamona antopue me baiwa wain iraiwa bedewe nolantopu. Mo me wana ruawantone nola awa antoiena. Tane omo kekeraleidio irai apanawa dewaipa deawaa dewalene nola apanawa isiwa diamono iraiwa nolawa awa anton.
40020006	Mo uduudu nolantoie laio rawileidio irai apanawa osowe apana auweia bolawe alene apana isiwa di eneie laio ewamone waitaramone wanase, ‘E dima baiwa tadinaida ita tauma nolalasiawaia di eneilano rawilen?’
40020007	Mo leusane waienase, ‘No nola anuwa wainitano mai mida da wisepe nola baiwa dianepona, dia!’ Irai apanawa epe etene diamone wanase, ‘Ne menanedia e aitane ne baina wain iraiwa bedewe nolaitana.’
40020008	Tane rarapirileidio irai apanawa nola dewalala oniamodia apanawa diene wanase, ‘E apana nolantoia diamowo wimoputuwapio malesamoa. Ne menanedia e malesa baiwaitone apana dainea nola baiwa muriwa wimoiena bauta malesamoe, aupe aite apana bauta nola awa wimoiena malesamoa.’
40020009	Oniamodia apanawa apana mida muriwa rawileidio wimoiena mane nepa dea wanamono oteiena.
40020010	Tane apana bautantone tadinaida nola awa wimoiena sosou ewamoio malesau wadeiena ita mo nuau bedewe inseia mo tadinaida wimoiena baiwa malesau debama wadapu, mai mo ruau. Ita mo malesau wadapua awa antone mane nepa deadea sosou wadeiena rua wanamono wadeiena, mai osowesape wadapona, dia.
40020011	Tane mo malesau wadane ewane nuau kadileno irai apanawa mampe antone momoduntone waienase,
40020012	‘No sosomba sa muriwaido wimone mai nolantopona daumawa, omo dea os bedewe nolanton, tane mo malesa no wadatana rua deawaa wadeiena. Sa ipa ambi? No nola pokaidaneno pola ainimbo noseno omo pokawaida etatano mai malesadewanepona, dia!’
40020013	Mo epe momoduntoio irai apanawa sou dea diene wanase, ‘Sona, ne mai e malesakadiepona, dia! Ne e dieena walama dea bedewe nolaitawo mane nepa dea eneepa, ita e nuaa euleno oaitene nola awa wien.
40020014	E malesaa ipa sa wade ene aitaa! Ne menanedia nola dewalala muriwa nola awa wimoiena deawaa wanamopa.
40020015	Mane ne os mainawoa nola dewalala malesamodina, ne neba insaisana rua dewasapa, e di momoduitiana. Ne apana amonala dewana euda osowe e epe dewaitiana, ba?’”
40020016	Ita Iesu gagalo babawa ema diasadie wane wanase, “Nola dewalala muriwalala bauta malesa wadeiena rua mo mida Gagalo euda muriwa eteie sumanaintoia God gonaawa bedewe bautantopue odapu. Tane mo mida Gagalo euda bautantone etane atentoiena muriwantopue God gonaawa bedewe odapu.”
40020017	Iesu Ierusalemwa odene aleidie wawe alala 12 diamono apana emone awoantoieno muba os mampo gagalolene wanase,
40020018	“Etanee, no odate antitana Ierusalemwa, sape Apana Otopa wadapue pirisi debamau ita anaana waeuwalala mamposapuo insaisau rua me mampe dewasapu. Mo me kotusapue bowa sauawa wapue
40020019	ita Rom gabemaniwa mamposapu. Mo me oiwa wapue, tai mampe epompe ita koros osowe seupuo bolepi. Tane walama natadeawo me bo bedewe enepiwisepi.”
40020020	Iesu ema wano aupe Sebedi manainapa obampa nata do Iesu mampe wimoiena. Ita inau Iesu wawa bumpe imimpa emmisilene waitarasane wanase, “Rua ba dia, e ne insaisana dewasaa?”
40020021	Tane Iesu i waitarasane wanase, “E dima meneede?” I sa leusane wanase, “Ne menanedia e sauanea warereitona walamawa osowe ne obaina ema nata witaa on ita sen deneuwe wampuo e do waina.”
40020022	Iesu Iems Ion nata sipoamone wanase, “E mai ateitapona dima menalena iririwaitilana! Poka etaetala reduwa ne napaa baiwantedina e inseilana nana rua, ba?” Mo leusane waienase, “Oa, no nataa rua!”
40020023	Ita Iesu mo diamone wanase, “E ulaipa ne pokana reduwa napino ideita nana! Tane ne mai mukana wineipona e sonabalepo da witana on ita da sen deneuwe waina. Ne Mamana bola sa imaamon mida me sonabamona os sape wampua baiwa.”
40020024	Wawe alala isiwa 10 ema umanawa etane mo sosou nata mampo nuau kadiidalen.
40020025	Tane Iesu mo uduudu apamone auwamone wanase, “E ateiten bola daitada onionialala apanawa mo bolau bedewe wanwanlala osouwo muka uduudu wadei ita kasawogantoie oniamoie badowa diamoio ruauntoi.
40020026	Tane e mai epe rua dewasana! Mida e bedelawo debamalepia menasampa me sosowa nolau dewala wanalepie simbiamompa.
40020027	Ita mida e bedelawo ebowa debamalepona menasampa me sosowa uduudu atouwolempe simbiaulempa.
40020028	Apana Otopa mai ebowa debama wadepio apana me simbiasapua baiwa wisepona, dia. Me wisena apana simbiamopie inawawa itupi epie apana uara kadi bedewe malesamopie inamopia baiwa.”
40020029	Iesu wawe alala do Ieriko ene antoio apana uara mo waroromoiena.
40020030	Tane apana emau potawa nata inta waiwe waimoie Iesu tampointa wisene aleidio umanawa eteiena. Sa baiwa mo mukantone wane waienase, “Tatamba, Dawid Otopa, no nuaparembaite saunea!”
40020031	Tane apana uara mo wadabuamone diamoiena dainantopu. Ita mo etanadabuasane osowe mukantone waienase, “Tatamba, Dawid Otopa, no nuaparembaite saunea!”
40020032	Iesu mo sau baiwa waio aindo enene mo apamono wimono waitaramone wanase, “Ne dima e baila dewasapaa menaledio iririneilana?”
40020033	Mo sipoasane waienase, “Tatamba, no menanedia e inanewo sala ewata!”
40020034	Ita Iesu mo nuapareulene witapa emau osowe ituno tauwadea emau euleno sala ewane Iesu warorosaiena.
40021001	Iesu wawe alala do Ierusalem mampentoie bola Betipage bedewe wadi Olib tampe wimoiena. Sape Iesu wawe alala nata waaubamone
40021002	diamone wanase, “E nata bola sisi nanlanepe winediawo aitana. Bola sawo odonune tauwadea pue donki inawa otopa do taudomoiena ewamona. Pue sa lotoaubamone banlamone ne mainawo winlena.
40021003	Apana da ambi dialepia me diane wanase, ‘Tatamba pue ema menasade.’ Me aia sa etepie pue tauwadea waaubamopio banlamone winlena.”
40021004	Tane Iesu wawe alala epe diamona, sa ipa dima peroweta bukawa bedewe girumalena ulaipalepia baiwa. Peroweta bukawa bedewe epe girumalene wadiase,
40021005	“Ierusalem apanawa ema epe benemamoa, ‘Ewana, e warerela manlawo iede! Me etepa molaaisiwa donki osowe waine aleide, me donki sanaa osowe waine iede.’”
40021006	Ita wawe alala antone Iesu diamona rua dewasaiena.
40021007	Mo donki otopa do banlamone wimone mo garau onapea pue osouwo teamoieno ita Iesu osowe odene wain.
40021008	Tane apana uara sape mo do laia garau onapea inta osowe abumoie. Ita sosou da notonkela asiwa tomoiena inta osowe teamone antoieno osowainta Iesu donki osowe waine aleidie.
40021009	Apana Iesu danawe ita adiwe enane antoia mo aiau mukama wane waienase, “Osana, Dawid Otopa wadatapos! Euda me mampe mida God ebowe iediawo! Osana, God ionoidoa wadaposisate debamasata!”
40021010	Iesu Ierusalemwa odedio apana sape wanwanlala uduudu nuau bumeno waitarantone waienase, “Me mida?”
40021011	Tane apana isiwa sipoamone waienase, “Sa ipa peroweta Iesu, me bolawa Nasaret Galili bedewe.”
40021012	Iesu God duwe odene leidie mo uduudu sape gimarantoie waimoie laia ewamone nuawa kadiidaleno tanamono nomone anton. Me mane leusaia apanawa watau ita do nene gimaralala watau memaaubamon.
40021013	Me diamone wanase, “Buka bedewe girumalena ema epe wadi wadiase, ‘Ne duna ipa uwa daitada apanawa rauparintompaa duwa.’ Tane e dewasalana poiwaa auwempaa dubu wanalen.”
40021014	God duwa bedewe apana emau potau ita apana etepu kiokiou Iesu mampe wimono me inamon.
40021015	Tane pirisi debamau ita anaana waeuwalala Iesu dewa eubu dewamodio eweiena ita do seda kerakera God duwa bedewe ka waie waiase, ‘Osana, Dawid Otopa wadatapos,’ mo etamone nuau kadiidalen.
40021016	Ita mo Iesu diane waienase, “Seda dima waia e eteiana, ba dia?” Iesu sipoamone wanase, “Oa, ne etedina! Tane e buka bedewe ema wisiaitene ateiten, ba dia, naepe wadi wadiase: ‘E seda kerakera ita otooto gegelau dewamoano e eboa wadaposisai.’”
40021017	Ema aupe Iesu mo emone Ierusalemwae nosene Betani bedewe alene sape wandie.
40021018	Imonemba tadinaida me leulene Ierusalemwa aleidie omanaton.
40021019	Sape inta waiwe me karakai iawa ewene mampe alen korou napia baiwa, tane ewensuden, asiwa os ewamon. Tauma Iesu karakai iawa diene wanase, “E mai osowe naua, dia!” Ita ia sa tauwadea os rorolene tonaidalen.
40021020	Tane wawe alala dewa ema ewane memesantone waitarantone waienase, “Ambi karakai iawa tauwadea rorolene tonaidalen?”
40021021	Iesu sipoamone wanase, “Ne ulaipa dialedina, naita e manlawo sumanai winompa ne dima karakai iawa ema mampe dewasana deawaa e dewasana rua. Ita do e rua os wadi ema diane wanase, ‘Enawie aite owa bedewe aubaubaitaa!’ E nuala bedewe mai insakoaitana ba sumanaila mai keraulepi, tane sumanaiidaitano ipawaida ando segalepi.
40021022	Naita e sumanaitane dima raupari bedewe iririwaitonuna ideita wadana.”
40021023	Iesu Ierusalemwa leulene wisene God duwa bedewe odene waeuwaleidio pirisi debamau ita apana eiau me mampe wimone waitarasane waienase, “E muka dainea mampe dewa ema dewamoiana? Mida muka eneen?”
40021024	Iesu sipoamone wanase, “Ne waitara dea dialepo sipoaneano muriwa ne dialepa ne mukana na wadane dewa ema dewamodina.
40021025	E dianeano etapo, Ion mukawa na wadene nolaleidie? Me God mukawa mampe apana babatutumodie ba apanaida mukawa mampe?” Iesu epe wane diamono muba inta banusaie gagalontope ambi wapona baiwa. Ita muba gagalontone waienase, “No ambi wata? Naita no wataase, ‘Ion God mukawa mampe nolaleidie apana babatutumodie,’ Iesu dianepie wapiase, ‘Naita epeewo, e dima baiwa me mai sumanaiwaitapona?’
40021026	Tane no mai rua wataase, ‘Ion apanaida mukawa waden,’ ipawa apana uduudu sumanaintone atenton Ion ipa peroweta God wanaubena.”
40021027	Ita mo apana nuau kadisapua sawantone Iesu lagasane waienase, “No Ion mukawa na wadene apana babatutumodia mai atentepona, dia!” Mo epe waieno Iesu diamone wanase, “E ne waitarana sipoa mai dianeapadewaitapona, sa baiwa ne mai dialepa mukana na wadane dewa ema dewamodina.”
40021028	Iesu osowesane wanase, “Apana dea me obampa nata do waimoie. Me otopa tautua mampe alene diene wanase, ‘Otona, ande aite wain iraiwa bedewe nolaitaa!’
40021029	Otopa tautua sipoasane wanase, ‘Ne dabuanen, mai dewasapa!’ Tane muriwa me insaisawa leusane irai awa alen.
40021030	Tauma mambu otopa kerauwa mampe alene deawaa diene wanase, ‘Otona, ande aite wain iraiwa bedewe nolaitaa!’ Me sipoasane wanase, ‘Oa, ne dewasapa!’ Tane muriwa me dabualen, mai nola awa alepona, dia.
40021031	Tauma e ambi inseilana, oto dainea dima mambu menasadia rua dewasan?” Mo sipoasane waienase, “Otopa tautua.” Iesu sipoamone wanase, “Ne ulaipa dialedina, takis manewa tamalala ita ioto ninalala bautantoie nanlanepe God gonaawa bedewe odei.
40021032	Ne epe wadina, ipawa Ion wisene ita God intawa euda dodomana euwalen, tane e mai sumanaiwaitapona, dia! Tane takis manewa tamalala ita ioto ninalala me sumanaiwanton. Mo epe dewantoio e ewalana, tane e mai insaisala leusape kadiwa epona, do Ion mai sumanaiwaitapona, dia.”
40021033	Ita Iesu wane wanase, “Tauma ne gagalo babawa da wapo etana: Apana dea wain irailene gonaalen. Ita me wain gadawa empidodepia baiwa don ton. Do iraiwa oniempaa duwa wadene diasane wain iraiwa oniepua apanawa witaposane diamona odawa moawa ando wanapu. Ita ene nowa dawo alen.
40021034	Aiaisa walamawa wiseno me nolawa dewalala onieia apanawa mampo waaubamono antoiena me mebaa moawa otepona baiwa.
40021035	Onieia apanawa mo ewamone wadaitumone, dea epaepabobosaiena, da di bosaiena ita da seu mampe epanaboleiena.
40021036	Ema aupe irai apanawaida nolawa dewalala uara waaubamono anton, mai nolawa dewalala isiwa bauta antoiena rua, tane irai onieia apanawa deawaa dewasaiena mo mampo.
40021037	Irai apanawaida ompa osowe otopaida wanaubeno mampo alen, ipawa me insenase, ‘Ne otonaida mo mampo wisepio wadapue mamposapue oniepudewantopu, mai kadisapu, dia.’
40021038	Tauma irai onieia apanawa irai apana otopaida iedio ewane muba gagalontone waienase, ‘Tauma irai ema apanawaida otopa wisen. Ane, me wadataitue bosate, aupe dima uduudu me mampea no taupakawantata!’
40021039	Dima mo waiena ruawantone antone irai apanawa otopaida wadanaitue wain iraiwa gonaawa adiwe aubeieno noseno sape epanaboleiena.”
40021040	Mape Iesu asisulala waitaramone wanase, “E ambi inseilana irai apanawaida leulepi wimpie irai onieia apanawa mampo dima dewasapi?”
40021041	Mo sipoasane waienase, “Kadi apanawa sa me bomopie kadiidamopi ita wain iraiwa onionia apanawa sanaau witaposapi, mo mida me mebaawa ipawa aiaisa walamawa osowe aisepue me wanapu.”
40021042	-
40021043	Mape Iesu wane wanase, “Ne dialedina, deawaa God gonaawa e manlawo wadepiaubepie ita apana da wanamopio wadapu, mo mida ia euda rua naupudewantopua. E buka bedewe wisiaitene ateiten, ba dia, naepe wadi wadiase, ‘Du wadawadalala apanawa seu dea ewanadabue eiena, mai menamopona, dia. Tane seu sa ewadabuasaia ipa eudidalene du awanediposidede. Tane ema ipa Tatamba God insaisawa rua dewasano segalen, mai di segalepona, dia. Ita insaisa sa me dewasana ewaewawa eudidalen no mainimbo.’
40021044	Apana mida seu sa osowe omepia epaepalepie boidalepi, ita apana mida osowe seu sa nosepia epepisisidepio bolepi.”
40021045	Pirisi debamau ita Parisi apanawa gagalo babawa ema etane atentoiena Iesu moida umanau wadie.
40021046	Ema bedewe mo inta banuntoiena Iesu wadapaitue kotusapona baiwa. Tane mo apana uaraia sape eneia sauntoiena, ipawa mo inseiena Iesu me ipa peroweta. Sa baiwa ene di antoiena, mai me wadapaitudepona, dia.
40022001	Iesu gagalo babawa da apana diamone wanase,
40022002	“God gonaawa ipa ema epe: Warere nolawa dewalala diamona me otopa baiwa nainai odawa imaasapu. Ita me oda sa baiwa apana nisou waaubaleno eteiena.
40022003	Oda walamawaida wiseno warere nolawa dewalala waaubamono antoiena nisolala diamopuo oda imaalene winedia bedewe wimopua baiwa. Tane mo oda bedewe awa dabuantone wankasanton.
40022004	Mo dabuantono baiwa warere oda dewasadia nolawa dewalala da waaubamona nisolala diamopue wapuase, ‘Sosona winlena, odana imaalene winede! Ne moiana kau eubuida bomone laulanteno imaantone wineia nata!’
40022005	Mo nisolala nisou osowe aleno etane oda bedewe awa dabuaidanton. Ita mo muba insaisau rua antoiena, dea iraiwa bedewe alen ita da gimara awa alen.
40022006	Tane nisolala isiwa dabuantone waimoie warere nolawa dewalala nisomopua awa mampo wimoieno wadaitumone kadikadimone epaboiamoiena.
40022007	Warere nolawa dewalala kadikadimoieno etene nuawa pokawaida wano me matangela mo osouwosapia baiwalene sorodiawa waaubamone diamone wanase, ‘Aitane, witakadilala sa uduudu epaboiamone ita mo bolau debamawa suno ipituwapi!’ Mo warere wana ruawantone antone witakadilala sa epaboiamone bolau suieno intuwan.
40022008	Ema aupe warere nolawa dewalala da diamone wanase, ‘Nainai odawa imaalene winede, tane mo nisolala kadiwaida oda awa wimopona dabuanton, mo dewau mai dodomana, dia, di nisokoamotana!
40022009	E tauma aitane bola uduudu bedewainta apana dommonuna nisomono oda bedewe wimopu.’
40022010	Ita nolawa dewalala me diamona rua bola uduudu bedewainta antone apana kadiwa ba euwa dommoia nisomone banlamone oda bedewe anton. Mo nisolala oda duwa bedewe odeieno apana uduudulen.
40022011	Warere nisolala auwamopia baiwa oda duwa bedewe odene alene auwamodie. Mo auwenatuwaiena bedeuwo apana dea mai nainai odawa garawa euda taupona wandio ewene
40022012	waitarasane wanase, ‘Sona, e ambi mape odaana? E mai nainai odawa garawa taupona, di wainiano eweedina.’ Warere apana sa waitarasadio dainalen, mai aia da wapona rua, dia.
40022013	Me dainakasaleno warere nolawa dewalala diamone wanase, ‘Apana ema wadane witapa ita wawa do taumone dubawa iwinla bedewe aubeno alepi. Sape me ke wampe poka etaidasampe asipa adompa.’”
40022014	Iesu gagalowa diasadie wanase, “Apana uaraia nisolala, tane mo bedeuwo isiwa os sonabalala.”
40022015	Parisi apanawa Iesu ene antone auwene gagalontone inta banusaie laga mampe Iesu waitarasampo wapikadisapio wadapua baiwa.
40022016	Sa baiwa Parisi sosou isiwa mo wauwo alala ita Erod sosowa isiwa do waaubamoieno antoiena Iesu mampe. Ita mo Iesu mampe wimone diane waienase, “Debamamba, no atenten e walama uduudu ulaipa os waeuwaitiana. E God insaisawa dodomana os apana waeuwamoiana, mai apana kerauda ita debama insaisau rua gagaloitipona.
40022017	E ambi inseiana, no ide rua Rom gabemaniwa mampe takis manewa ituta? E dianewo atentata!”
40022018	Tane mo kadiwa dima inseia Iesu atenlene baiwa diamone wanase, “E lagawaauida! Dima baiwa laga mampe waitaraneilana?
40022019	E mane sa nepa ambi rua malesaitilana euwaneano ewapa!” Mo mane sa wadane Iesu mampe wimoieno me ewene waitaramone wanase,
40022020	“Ewana, ema mida namba ita mida ebowa mane ema osowe winei?”
40022021	Mo leusane waienase, “Rom gabemaniwa ionoidoa namba ita ebowa winei.” Ita Iesu diamone wanase, “Ide, dima gabeman mampea gabeman wanana, tane dima God mampea ipa God wanana.”
40022022	Mo ema etane memesantone me ene antoiena.
40022023	Walama sa deawaawo Sadusi apanawa waitara do Iesu mampe wimoiena. Mo sumanaintoie inseia apana bolala ando mai bo bedewe enapuwimopue waimompa, dia.
40022024	Sa baiwa mo Iesu mampe wimone waienase, “Debamamba, Moses ema epe girumalene ituno winede: Apana mona nainaila obampasiawaia bolepio aupe apana sa wambaida tatawa obupa naisepie otootolepi tatawa baiwa. No menanedia anaana sa ipawaida atenidantata. Sa baiwa no duduna da dieeto etee waeuwanewo atentata.”
40022025	Mape mo dudunau Iesu diane waienase, “Apana wanwamba 6 bolauwo waimoie. Tautua dea nainailene obampasiawaia bolen. Tauma tautua wawea obu sa naisen.
40022026	Tane me mampe deawaa segalen, me do obampasiawaia bolen. Ita wambu natadeawa mampe deawaa segalen. Tane wanwambu ompu epe os dewantontuwan, mo uduudu i sa naiseiena ita obampusiawaia di bontoiena.
40022027	Ompa osowe obu sa do bolen.
40022028	I sa apana 7 naimono bontoiena. Sa baiwa no waeuwanewo atentata apana bolala bo bedewe enapuwimopue waimompo i sa apana dainea manainapaida wanalepi?”
40022029	Iesu mo sipoamone wanase, “Buka bedewe dima girumalena e mai inseipadewaitipe ita do God mukawa mai ateitipe wanleipona, dia. Sa baiwa waitarala surakauaia waile dianeilana.
40022030	Apana bolala bo bedewe enapuwimopue waimompaa walamawe mo mai nainaintopu, dia, mo ensel uboo waimoia ruau di waimompa.
40022031	Tane bo bedewe enawisa umanawa dima God buka bedewe e dialena mai wisiaitapona, ba? Me ema epe wadi wadiase,
40022032	‘Ne ipa Abraam Godiwa, Aisak Godiwa ita Iakob Godiwa.’ Insenadewaitana, me mai bolala Godiu, dia, tane me ipa mo wanwankasalala Godiu.”
40022033	Apana uara ema etane ita Iesu waeuwawa mampe memesanton.
40022034	Iesu Sadusi apanawa sipoadewasamodio mo mai dima da wapona rua. Ita ema umanawa Parisi apanawa etane auwenatue Iesu mampe anton.
40022035	Tane mo bedeuwo anaana waeuwalala dea menasadia Iesu waitara mampe rubusapi, sa baiwa me diene wanase,
40022036	“Debamamba, anaana dainea debamawaida uduudu bedeuwo?”
40022037	Iesu leusane wanase, “E Tataa God nuaa uduudu, insaisaa uduudu, atena uduudu, ita do mukaa uduudu mampe nuawadawadasane wanempa.
40022038	Anaana ema dea debamawaida uduudu bedeuwo.
40022039	Tane da deawaa debamawaida: ‘Sosoa nuawadawadamona eba nuawadawadaitiana rua.’
40022040	Moses anaanawa ita peroweta waeuwau uduudu anaana ema nata bedewentoiena.”
40022041	Parisi apanawa isiwa sape auweiena Iesu waitaramone wanase,
40022042	“E Keriso mida God sauawalen baiwa ambi inseilana, me mida otopa?” Mo sipoasane waienase, “Keriso ipa Dawid atanosiwa.”
40022043	Ita Iesu mo waitaramone wanase, “Tane dima baiwa Aleu kakaiwa Dawid insaisawa waneno Keriso ebowa Tatana wan? Dawid ema epe wane wanase,
40022044	‘Tatamba God ne Tatana mampe wane wanase, ‘Witana on deneuwe aisite wana ne ideita e wenawenaa nanausimope e waa atowe teamopatuwapi.”
40022045	Dawid Keriso ebowa wadi wadiase, ‘Tatana,’ tane ambi Keriso ipa Dawid atanosiwa?”
40022046	Mai mida da Iesu sipoasapona rua, dia. Tane ema aupe apana Iesu waitarawa santoiena.
40023001	Ema aupe Iesu apana uara auweiena ita wawe alala do diamone wanase,
40023002	“Anaana waeuwalala ita Parisi apanawa Moses aupawa wadeie anaana waeuwantoi.
40023003	Ne menanedia mo dima uduudu waie dialeia rua dewasanune wanlempa, mai da ena, dia. Tane mo dewau mai ruawaitana, ipawa mo dima waeuwantoia mai ruawantoipe dewasaipona, dia.
40023004	Mo anaanau uaraia waie mampe sai debamaia apana osouwo ituio awaneie surakaumodio poka etei. Tane mo mubaida sai sa awaawanawa dabuantoie mai sosou saumoipona, dia.
40023005	Anaana waeuwalala ita Parisi apanawa dewa uduudu apana ewamompe asou wampaa os baiwa dewamoi. Israel apanawa dewau ema epe: Mo God aiawa girumala isiwa oteie nambu ita witapu osowe taumoi insamompaa baiwa. Tane Parisi ita anaana waeuwalala ebou debamalempaa baiwa giruma debamauia di dewamoie taumoi. Do mo garau moawa siapa daumau osowe taumoi apana ewamompe asou wampaa baiwa.
40023006	Mo oda bedewe wanwan bolawa eubu sonabamoi ita gagalo duwa bedewe wanwan bolawa pokawaau wadeie osowe waimoi.
40023007	Mo menamodia apana maket bolawe wiwira mampe auwamompa, ita ituposimompe ebou wampaase, ‘Debamamba.’
40023008	Mai mida e wanawo alala ebola wapi wapiase, ‘Debamana.’ Diaida! Ne epe wadina, ipawa Debamala dea os wande, tane e uduudu sumanai apanawa sosola do wainilana.
40023009	Ita tawo osowe mai apana ebowa wane wanase, ‘Mamamba.’ Diaida! Ipawa e Mamala dea os, me ipa uboo wande.
40023010	Mai mida sola ebowa wapi wapiase, ‘Somba eia.’ Diaida! Ipawa e sola eia dea os wande, me ipa Keriso.
40023011	Mida e bedelawo debamalepia meba ituaisilepie nola dewala rua sosowa simbiamopi.
40023012	Ipawa me mida meba ituposileidie debamaidaleipona menasadia God me itupiaisidepi. Tane me mida God sawaleidie meba ituaisileidie sosowa atouwoleidie simbiauleidia God me itupiposidepio debamaidalepi.”
40023013	“Kadiwa rebarebaida e anaana waeuwalala ita Parisi manlawo, e ipa lagawaauida! E God gonaawa moawa apana danauwo guduitilana! E eba mai God gonaawa bedewe odeipona, dia, tane do mida mo odaoda menamompa e enabodamoilana.
40023014	-
40023015	Kadiwa rebarebaida e anaana waeuwalala ita Parisi manlawo, e ipa lagawaauida! E bola nowa dawo owa nanausaile aitile apana dea dewasailano e sumanailaleidie do e waeuwala ruawaleide. Inta ema bedewe apana sa bola kadiwa otopaida wanalepi. Ando me ita e do ideita bola kadiwaida bedewe aitana!
40023016	Kadiwa rebarebaida e manlawo! E ipa emala potawa tane sosola da banlamoilana. E wailanase, ‘Apana mida God duwa ebowa mampe kangoraleidia, sa ide me ando mai dewasapi. Tane mida God duwa bedewe gold winedia ebowa mampe kangoraleidia me ideita ruawalepie dewasapi.’
40023017	E insaisala kiokiolen, emala potawa apanawa wainilana! Dima debamawaida, gold os, ba God duwa dima gold eusadia?
40023018	Do e wailanase, ‘Mida pulo itutula bolawa ebowa mampe kangoraleidia, sa ipa ipasia, tane mida amona pulo bolawa osowe winedia ebowa mampe kangoraleidia, me ideita ruawalepie dewasapi.’
40023019	E ipa emala potawa! Dima debamawaida, amona, ba pulo ituia bolawa dima amona eusadia?
40023020	Sa baiwa apana mida pulo ituia bolawa ebowa mampe kangoraleidia, me ipa ituia bolawa ebowa ita amona osowe winedia do kangorauleide.
40023021	Tane apana mida God duwa ebowa mampe kangoraleidia, me God duwa ita mida bedewe wandia ebou mampe kangorauleide.
40023022	Ita mida uba ebowa mampe kangoraleidia, me ipa God kolaiwatawa ita mida osowe wandia ebou mampe kangorauleide.
40023023	Kadiwa rebarebaida e anaana waeuwalala ita Parisi manlawo! E lagawaauida! E iraila bedewe nitu bonabonaua kerakera wineia moawa anaana wadia rua God waneilana, tane dima debamaia God anaanawa bedewe e eilana, mai dewasaipona. Dewa ema debamaia God anaanawa bedewe: Apana uduudu mampo deawaa os dewasanune wanlempa, sosola nuapareuitonune saumonuna, ita ulaipa wanune dewasanuna. E epe dewaitonune ita do God mampe amonaitilana mai ena.
40023024	E apana emala potawa tane sosola da banlamoilana! E esa bedewe takula alepio nana sawa eneilabodeilana, tane pue debama kamel e naile numeilana.
40023025	Kadiwa rebarebaida e anaana waeuwalala ita Parisi manlawo! E lagawaauida! E redula ita abomala onapea os mitamoilano sapa wai, tane dima bedewe winamoia e muka mampe waile danuweile eba baiwaitilana.
40023026	E Parisi emala potawa wainilana! Bauta redula ita abomala bedeu mitamona, epe dewaitano onapea do sapa wapi.
40023027	Kadiwa rebarebaida e anaana waeuwalala ita Parisi manlawo! E lagawaauida! E ewaewala ipa bo meamba deuntoio euda winedia rua, onapea ewaewa eudida, tane bedewe ipa bolala nepa ita boawa kadiwaida winede.
40023028	Deawaaida, e apana danauwo ewaewala abo euda ita dodomana, tane e bedela ipa laga ita kadi nopelen.”
40023029	“Kadiwa rebarebaida e anaana waeuwalala ita Parisi manlawo! E ipa lagawaau! E peroweta tontau meambu osouwo seu eubu dewamoile endomoilana ita apana eubu dodomanau meambu e benamoilana.
40023030	Ita e wailanase, ‘No nosinosimba walamauwo wainipono no mai mo do deantepe peroweta bomopona, diaida.’
40023031	E epe waile eba benemala wailana e ipa peroweta bomoiena apanawa nosinosiu wainilana.
40023032	Ide, nosinosila kadi dewasaiena rua e do aitane dewasane diasana!
40023033	E ipa mota, ita mota obampaida wainilana! Mai insenase e kotu saiene ene bola kadiwaida bedewe mai aitana!
40023034	Sa baiwa peroweta, insaisa dodomana apanawa ita waeuwa apanawa ne waaubamodina e manlawo. Isiwa e epaboiamona, isiwa koros osowe bomona ita isiwa gagalo duwa bedewe tai mampe epamone tanamono bola deadea bedeuwointa antopu.
40023035	Bumpeido ita tauma apana eubu dodomanau e bomolana ita mo osinau e witalawo winede! Bauta apana euda dodomana ebowa Abel e bosalana ita odene wisene ompa osowe e Berakia otopa ebowa Sakaria God duwa bedewe pulo ituia bolawa ita du pouwaida sawanawe bosalana.
40023036	Ne ulaipa dialedina, kadi sa uduudu matangelawa walama ande apanawa wadapu, mai dia.”
40023037	Mape Iesu Ierusalem apanawa insamone nuawa polaida wano wane wanase, “Ierusalem, Ierusalem, e dewala insedine nuana enidasade. E God perowetawa epaboiamoile wainilana! Ita mo mida God waaubamodio manlawo wimoie nolantoia seu mampe epaboiamoilana. Kanka inawa obampa auwamodie mabupa atowemodie oniadewasamodia rua ne walama uduudu nuana menaidasadia e auwalepono mainawoitapona, tane e mampe dabuaitile wainilana.
40023038	Ewane, God Ierusalem ita me duwa sape enedia dabuamopie matangelawa osouwolepio kadintoputuwapi.
40023039	Ne epe dialedina, ipawa ne e elepo mai ewaneana ideita walama wisempo e wane wanase, ‘Euda me mampe, mida Tatamba God ebowe iedia.’”
40024001	Iesu God duwa ene aleidio wawe alala me mampe wimone waienase, “Debamamba, God duwa ema empuempula eneia ewamoa!”
40024002	Iesu sipoamone wanase, “E tauma du ema uduudu ewamoile asou wailana. Tane ne ulaipaida dialedina, du sa uduudu kadimopituwapi, mai seu da bolawe winepia rua, uduudu noanamopuo nomoputuwapi.”
40024003	Iesu Ierusalemwa ene alene wadi Olib osowe wisene sape aisidene wandio me wawe alala muba wimone me waitarasane waienase, “Dianea, dewa ema walama dainea segalepi, ita eueuwa inainamba ambi no ewate atentata e wiwisaa walamawa ita walama ompa wisede.”
40024004	Iesu sipoamone wanase, “Ewanadewaitana ita mai mida da e lagalepie banlakadisalepi.
40024005	Ne epe wadina, ipawa apana uara ne ebonawo wimompe wampaase, ‘Ne ipa Keriso mida e onioniawaitile wainilana winen inalepaa baiwa.’ Mo ne ebona wampe nolantompe apana uara banlakadisamopuo waeuwau bedewentopu.
40024006	-
40024007	E bola uara daitada onantompo gagalowa etana ita do bola isiwa ona baiwa imaantompo umanau etane mai saitane insenase, ‘Tauma ipa sa walama ompa wisen.’ Tane sa dia. Aia daitada wawalala bola daitada bedewe onantompe waimompa. Do natunakani ita wanatata bola uara daitada bedewe segantompo pokawa apana etompe waimompa.
40024008	Poka sa ipa i oto mu baiwaleidio poka etedia rua. Tane poka sa mai i oto gamoidalepia pokawa rua, dia. Poka sa segantompa ipa eueuwa e baila, ewamone ateitana walama ompa maidaleide. Tane ompaida ando segalepi.
40024009	Tane e wadalepue kadilepu ita epaboialepu. Ita uwa daitada apanawa ne ebona baiwa e nibualepu.
40024010	Walama sawo apana uara insakoantopue sumanaibu epue omepu ita muba sou nanantopu do muba nibunibuantopu.
40024011	Peroweta lagawaau uara segantopu ita apana uara banlakadisamopu.
40024012	Dewa kadiwa rebareba debamalepia baiwa apana uara bedeuwo nuawadawada obasalepi.
40024013	Tane mida ompa osowe badowa enedia me inaida donsapie inalepi.
40024014	Ita Gagalo euda God gonaawa umanawa tawo uduudu bedewe benemantopuo uwa daitada apanawa etapu. Epe segalempo tauma ompaida wisepi.
40024015	Apana wisiala e gagalo ema ipawaida atendewaitana: Walama ando e God duwa bola kakaila bedewe nitu nuadabualalaida itupuo enompo e ewana, peroweta Daniel wana rua.
40024016	Nitu nuadabualalaida sape enompo kadi rebarebaida segalepia baiwalempo mo Iudiawo wanwanlala kadi sawantopue bolau epue weuwapue wadiwa antopue waimompa.
40024017	Me mida walama sa bedewe peloo waimpe leumpa mai a baiwa du bedewe odepie puraiwawa otepi, dia. Me tauwadea bolawa epie di weuwapie wadiwa alepie inalepi.
40024018	Ita apana iraileidia mai garawa otaotawa insaisawalepie duwa awa alepie walamawa diasapi.
40024019	Walama sa ipa pokawaaida ioto bulala ita mo mida oto gegelau do baibu, ipawa mo mai tauwadea os bolau epue wadiwa antopua rua.
40024020	God mampe rauparitana dewa inainamba ema mai unu walamawe ba Sabat osowe segalepi, ipawa walama sawo e mai tauwadea weuwane aitana rua, dia.
40024021	Mo inantopua baiwa wadiwa antopu, ipawa walama sawo poka etaetalalaida segalepi. Tane poka sa rua mai God tawo dewasanawo ita tauma segalepona, dia. Ita poka walamawa sa dialepio aupe mai poka da ema rua segalepi, dia.
40024022	Poka etaetala walamawa sa daumalempe alempo mai mida da inalepi, dia, uduudu bontoputuwapi. Tane sonabalala baibu God poka walamawa sa kampasapie itupi.
40024023	Walama sa bedewe apana isiwa e dialempe wampaase, ‘Sosona, Keriso inalepia mape wande,’ ita do wampaase, ‘Keriso sisi wande.’ Mo epe dialempo mai sumanaibuitana, dia.
40024024	E mai sumanaibuitana, ipawa walama sawo Keriso lagawaau ita do peroweta lagawaau uara segantopue wimopu. Ita mo ginasa eueuwa pokawaau dewamompe sonabalala banlakadisamompaa baiwa. Tane mo mai banlakadisamopua rua, diaida.
40024025	Etanadewaitana, dima ando segalepia ne tauma diaimaaledina.
40024026	Naita apana da dialepi wapiase, ‘Ewana, Keriso sala dainala bedewe wande,’ sape mai aitana! Ba apana da dialepi wapiase, ‘Ewana, Keriso ema du pouwe wande,’ mai sumanaiwaitana, dia.
40024027	Ipawa Apana Otopa wiwisawa kelama lotodie sapawa tawo moawa daitada osowe sapa wadia rua apana uduudu ewompo segalepi.
40024028	Eueuwa ema insena: Bo etepu wineiawo sape nene galobu auwempo ita apana ewapue atentopu, sape apa bo winei. Ewaewa ema rua Apana Otopa wiwisawa apana emauwo sabamo segalepi.”
40024029	“Poka debamaia walamawa sa diantopuo aupe dewa inainamba da segantopu buka bedewe girumalena rua, wadi wadiase, ‘Omo dubalepie sala iwinlepi ita uaboa mai sapa wapi, dia. Kipora uboe nomoputuwapio uba ita sala do ewaewawa rebarebaidalepi.’
40024030	Ema segalempo walamawe Apana Otopa wisepia eueuwa uba tampe segalepi, ita uwa daitada apanawa santompe nuau kekelempa. Tane mo Apana Otopa giou bedewe iompo mukawa ita sapawaida do ewapu.
40024031	Nitu bui rua tarampet aiawa debama wapi ita Apana Otopa me enseliwa waaubamopio antopu, me sonabamodia apanawa tawo moawa daitadawo wanwanlala auwamopua baiwa.
40024032	Ia karakai mampe aten wadana! Walamaipa ia seupa inintopue asiu sanaa teamompo e ewane ateitana maura walamawa kampalen.
40024033	Deawaa, dewa pokawaau ema segantompo e ateitana Apana Otopa wiwisawa walamawa maidalen, du nopeido.
40024034	Ne ulaipa dialedina, walama ande apanawa mai bontoputuwapio dewa ema uduudu segantopu.
40024035	Uba ita tawo uduudu diaidantopu, tane ne aiana mai dialepi, diaida!”
40024036	“Apana Otopa wiwisawa walamawa ba omowa sa mai mida da atenleipona, dia! God enseliwa uboa mai atentoipona, God Otopa do dia, tane Mamamba os walama sa atenlen.
40024037	Tane Apana Otopa wiwisawa walamawe dima bauta Noa walamawe segalena rua deawaa segalepi.
40024038	Apana odantoie nana naie ita nainaintoie ita Noa waa bedewe odeno unu debama wano abaia uduudulen.
40024039	Dima segalepia mo mai atentopona, di wankoantoio abaia nosene awanamontuwan. Apana Otopa wiwisawa ewaewawa Noa walamawe segalena rua segalepi.
40024040	Apana nata irai bedewe leumpo tane Apana Otopa wisepie dea wadepie mampesapi ita da epio sape wankasalepi.
40024041	Deawaa, ioto nata duwo awodea nana laulantompo tane Apana Otopa wisepie i dea wadepie mampesapi, ita da epio sape wankasalepi.
40024042	Sa baiwa onioniadewaitana insaisala wadaaubala wanlempa! Mai di wankoaitonuna, dia, ipawa e mai ateitapona walama dainea e Tatala leulepie wisepi.
40024043	Ema etane insenadewaitana: Naita du apanawa atenlepona omo daineawo poi apanawa wisepia me iwudewalempa poiwaa mai ewepikadisapio du epeike bedewe odepi, dia.
40024044	Epe rua deawaa e do imaaitonune wanlempa, ipawa Apana Otopa walama dainea e mai me wisepia insaisawaitipona bedewe wisepi.”
40024045	“Du apanawa nola dewalala dainea sonabepi me sosowa oniamompe ita mo nanau omo ruawalempe wanamompa? Me ipa dodomana ita insaisa euda apanawa sonabepio nola sosowa isiwa oniamopi.
40024046	Walamaipa du apanawa leulepi wisepie ita nolawa dewalala noladewalempo donsapia, nola dewalala sa ideita nuaeu debama donsapi.
40024047	Ne ulaipa dialedina, du apanawa nitu uduudu me mampea nolawa dewalala sa witapesapio oniamompa.
40024048	Tane naita nolawa dewalala sa insepie wapiase, ‘Du apanawa alaleide, mai tauwadea wisepi,’
40024049	ita tauma me insepirebae nola dewalala isiwa epamopi ita me sosowa do narebasantompe esa badowa nampe uwau koakoalempo waimompa.
40024050	Tane nola dewalala sa du apanawa wiwisawa walamawa ita omowa mai insaisawalempe di wankoalempo tauma du apanawa leulepie wisepi.
40024051	Me nola dewalala sa epe dewalempo donsapia me badowaida matangelasapie ita lagawaau bolauwo aubepio mo do waimompa. Sape mo ke wampe poka etaidasampe asipu adompa.”
40025001	Iesu gagalo babawa da mo diamone wanase, “God gonaawa ipawanalempo Apana Otopa warere awa wisepia walamawe ema epe rua segalepi: Ioto sanaau uduudu 10 siwau otamone nomone nainai apanawa into donsapua awa antoiena.
40025002	-
40025003	Mo bedeuwo ioto sanaau 5 insadewasalala, tane 5 da insakadisalala, mai dewa atendewantope nainai apanawa wisepia baiwa siwa esapa imaala wadapona, dia. Nainai apanawa iedio mo siwau nepa os otamone sosou do antoiena.
40025004	Tane ioto insadewasalala siwa esapa imaala dugiwa do otamone antoiena.
40025005	Ioto antoie into nainai apanawa alaleidio baiwa etepu garigarileno ituntoie.
40025006	Tane tadina pouwaleidio apana da mukalene benemalene wanase, ‘Nainai apanawa iede, wine auwasana!’
40025007	Mo ituntoia benema sa etane emau lotone enanawimone siwau debamamone nainai apanawa anuwa waimoie.
40025008	Tane ioto insakadisalala sosou insadewasalala diamone waienase, ‘E siwala esapa moawa saunena, no siwamba bontoi.’
40025009	Ita ioto insadewasalala leusane waienase, ‘Dia, sa mai ide, no epe dewantata no siwamba do bontopu. Aitane, gimara duwa bedewe eba baila siwa esapa gimaraitana.’
40025010	Ioto insadewasalala sosou epe diamoieno etane mo siwa esapa gimarantopua baiwa antoiena. Mo ene antoieno aupo nainai apanawa wiseno ioto insadewasalala imaantoie waimoia me do oda awa antoiena. Mo nainai odawa duwa bedewe odanatuwaieno du moawa gudulen.
40025011	Ioto insakadisalala siwa esapa awa antone laie wimone sosou aupau ewanasue antone nainai odawa duwa mampe enane mukantoie iririntoie waiase, ‘Debamamba, e du moawa wadaaubewo no odataa menanede!’
40025012	Mo epe badowa iririntoio nainai apanawa diamone wanase, ‘E mai odana rua, dia, e apana dainea, ne mai atenleipona!’”
40025013	Ita Iesu gagalowa diasadie wanase, “E Apana Otopa wiwisawa walamawa mai ateitipe wanleipona baiwa insaisala wadaaubalala imaaitonune wanlempa, mai di wankoaitonuna, dia!”
40025014	Ema aupe Iesu wane wanase, “Ne gagalo babawa da dialepa, ema epe: Apana dea bolawa ene a baiwaleidie me nolawa dewalala uduudu apamono mampe wimoiena. Ita me nituwa uduudu mo witaposana oniamompe waimompa.
40025015	Me nolawa dewalala natadea mo deadea atembu ruawalene manewa odalene wanamona nolawantopue dewasapuo debamalepi. Nolawa dewalala dea mane petawa 5 wanen, ita sowa da mane petawa nata wanen, ita sou da mane petawa dea wanen. Du apanawa mo mane wanamone nolau witaposane awa insaisawaleidia alen.
40025016	Nolawa dewalala mane petawa 5 wanena me dodomana alene nolawalene dewasano debamalen, ita me mane petawa 5 osowesane itun.
40025017	Nola dewalala wawea deawaa dewasane noladewalene mane petawa nata osowesane ituno debamalen.
40025018	Tane mo sou da mane petawa dea wanena wadene alene dogo tone bedewe mane wadena dobolene en.
40025019	Mo epe nolantoie waimoio walama daumawa dialeno mane wanamona apanawa leulene wisene nolawa dewalala apamono wimon mane bauta wanamona gagalowantopua baiwa, mane sa mo wadane ambi dewasaiena.
40025020	Nolawa dewalala mane petawa 5 wanena me nolawalene mane debamawa donsan, petawa 10 seganton. Me mane sa otene mane wanena apanawa mampe wisene wanase, ‘Debamana, e mane petawa 5 neaano nolawantene mane debamawa donsana, tauma petawa 10 leusane eneedina.’
40025021	Mane wanena apanawa ema etene nuawa euleno diene wanase, ‘E nola dewalala eudida, sumanaiantedina apanawa, e noladewaiten. E nitu kerakera onioniau atendewaitena baiwa ne ituepo nitu debamau oniamona. E ne nuana eusaana baiwa winewo ane nuaeuntate odantata!’
40025022	Ema aupe nolawa dewalala da mane petawa nata wanena wisene wanase, ‘Debamana, e mane petawa nata neaana, tane ne nolawantene mane petawa nata da osowesane ituno petawa 4 segantono leusane eneedina.’
40025023	Mane wanena apanawa ema etene diene wanase, ‘E nola dewalala eudida, sumanaiantedina apanawa, e noladewaiten! E nitu kerakera onioniau atendewaitena baiwa ne ituepo nitu debamau oniamona. E ne nuana eusaana baiwa winewo ane nuaeuntate odantata!’
40025024	Mape nola dewalala mane petawa dea wanena wisene wanase, ‘Debamana, ne atenten e apana badowa, e mai dima amponawo uwauwaitiana, ita mai naumba aimoiponawo di aitie aisamoiana.
40025025	Ne e saantene baiwa manea neaana wadane antene dogo tone bedewe dobonteno winakasalen. Dima e ne neaana deawaa leusane eneedina.’
40025026	Mane wanena apanawa ema etene nuawa kadiidaleno diaidasane wanase, ‘E nola dewalala oauara kadiwaida! E ateiten ne apana badowa, ne mai dima amponawo uwauwantedina, ita mai naumba aneipona tane di aisamodina!
40025027	Eulena e epe dewasapona: Manena eneena e banika bedewe ituipe epono wineipe inileipona. Ne insaisana itune insedina leunteape wineape bopawa wadapona, tane e mai banika bedewe itupona, dia.’
40025028	Tauma du apanawa me sausaia diamone wanase, ‘Apana sa mampe mane wadanaaubene aitane apana mane petawa 10 wadene wisena wanana.
40025029	Ipawa mida mampe nitu da winedia osowesapie wanepi, tane me debamaia wanepio rua os mauralepi. Tane me mida keraudaida os mampe winompa keraudaida sa me mampe wadapaaubepo me nituwasiawaia waimpe nuaparelepi.
40025030	Tauma nolakadikadilala sa wadapuaubepuo alepi dubawa iwinla bedewe. Sape me ke wampe poka etaidasampe asipa adompa.’”
40025031	“Apana Otopa ensel uduudu do wimopue tauma me kolaiwatawa osowe sapaida do wampio
40025032	ita apana bola daitada bedeuwo wanwanlala uduudu me danawe auweputuwapi. Mape me mo empuempumopi, onionia apanawa sipsip ita gote empuempumodia rua.
40025033	Me sipsip witapa on deneuwe teamopi, tane gote witapa sen deneuwe teamopi.
40025034	Ita warere apana witapa on deneuwe diamopie wapiase, ‘E mida ne Mamana euwa osolawo ituna winlena! Winlena ita God gonaawa tawo segasadie walamawe e baila imaasano winedia wadana!
40025035	Ne omanatoneno e nana nealano nana. Ne gadompana makoleno e esa nealano nana. Ne ware wineno e banlanealano dulawo odana.
40025036	Ne gara abolawanteno e ne gara nealano tauna. Ne kero wadaneno e wilene ne oniadewasanealana. Ne dibura bedewe wainedino e wilene ne nuadubunealana.’
40025037	Mape apana dodomanau sipoasapue wapuase, ‘Tatamba, walama dainea omanatoedio nana eneetano naana, ba gadompaa makoleidio esa eneetano naana?
40025038	Walama dainea e ware wieno no banlaetano dumba bedewe odaana, ba gara abolawaitiano eneetano tauana?
40025039	Walama dainea kero wadeeno ba dibura bedewe wainiano no winene nuadubuetana?’
40025040	Ita warere leusapi wapiase, ‘Ne ulaipa dialedina, dima uduudu ne sumanai sona debama ba kerauda me mampe dewasalana, sa ipa neida baina dewasalana.’
40025041	Tauma me apana witapa sen deneuwe diamopie wapiase, ‘E apana matangelala eneane nambeido ia iikasalalawo aitana! Bola sa ipa imaala kadi mamba Seitan ita me sausaia do baibu.
40025042	Ne omanatoneno, tane e mai nana da neapono napona, dia! Ne gadompana makoleno, tane e mai esa da neapono napona, dia!
40025043	Ne ware wineno, tane e ne mai banlaneapono dulawo odapona, dia! Ne gara abolawanteno, tane e ne mai gara neapono taupona, dia! Ne kero wadaneno ita do dibura bedewe wainedino, tane e mai ne onianeapona, dia!’
40025044	Tauma mo do sipoasapue wapuase, ‘Tatamba, walama dainea e omanatoedio ba gadompaa makoleidio no eweete tane mai sauepona? Walama dainea e ware wieno, ba gara abolawaitiano eweete tane mai sauepona? Walama dainea kero wadeeno ba dibura bedewe wainiano tane mai sauepona?’
40025045	Ita warere sipoamopie wapiase, ‘Ne ulaipa dialedina, dima uduudu apana debama ba kerauda mampe e mai dewasapona, sa ipa ne baina dewasapona elana.’
40025046	Ita mo dewasialala matangela winakasalala bedewe waaubamopi, tane apana dodomana eubu inawinakasalawo antopu.”
40026001	Iesu gagalo ema uduudu diasane me wawe alala diamone wanase,
40026002	“E atenla walama nata bedewe Pasowa odawa walamawa segalepi ita sawana sa bedewe mo Apana Otopa koros osowe bosapua baiwa nanantopu.”
40026003	Tane walama sawo pirisi debamau ita apana eiau pirisi ionoidoa ebowa Kaiapas duwe auwene
40026004	gagalontone inta banusaia Iesu werego wadape bosapona baiwa.
40026005	Mo epe dewantoie, ipawa mo inseie waiase, “No Iesu mai oda walamawe wadataitue bosataa rua, apana uara ewanepue nuau kadilepio onamba enapua sawa.”
40026006	Iesu Betani bedewe apana ebowa Saimon duwe wandie. Saimon sa mapo kero kito wadawadala inalena.
40026007	Iesu sape nana nadio i dea ia asiwa bonabonaua esapa dugi euda bedewe imaala wadene wisene ita Iesu uwawa osowe memen. Tane esa sa malesawa ipa debamaia.
40026008	Iesu warorowa dewa ema ewane nuau kadileno wane waienase, “Dima baiwa esa ema di memenaubene kadisan?
40026009	Esa bonabonaua ema gimaralepe mane debamaia wadape apana nuaparelala saumopona.”
40026010	Iesu aiau ema atenlene diamone wanase, “Dima baiwa me epe dieile nuawa kadisailana?
40026011	Apana nuaparelala walama uduudu e do wanlempe saumonuna rua. Tane ne mai walama uduudu e do wainento oniadewasaneanuna, dia.
40026012	I ema esa bonabonaua ne etena osowe memen, sa ipa ne dobosaneapua baiwa imaanen.
40026013	Ne ulaipa dialedina, bola uduudu bedewe Gagalo euda amonantompa dima i ema dewasana do gagalowa wampa, me dudunawa insempaa baiwa.”
40026014	Ema aupe wawe alala 12 bedeuwo dea ebowa waia Iudas Iskariot pirisi debamau mampo alene
40026015	waitaramone wanase, “Naita ne Iesu witalawosapo e sipoa dima ne neana?” Mo epe etane mane silwa wisiantona 30 me waneiena.
40026016	Ita Iudas mane wadene tauma walamawa euda wadepidewae Iesu nanalepie mo witaposapia onioniawaleidie wandie.
40026017	Tane Ierusalem bedewe oda walama uwawe apana bured sasanasiawaia nai, walama sawo Iesu wawe alala me mampe wimone waitarasane waienase, “Naepe e meneedia no Pasowa nanawa imaasata e baia?”
40026018	Iesu sipoamone wanase, “Aitane Ierusalem bedewe apana ne atentena donsane diane wanase, ‘Debamamba ema epe wade: Ne walamanaida tauma maidalen. Ne menanedia wanawo alala do e duawo Pasowa nanawa nata.’”
40026019	Wawe alala Iesu diamona rua dewasane ita Pasowa nanawa imaasaiena.
40026020	Rawileidio Iesu wawe alala 12 do wimone nana napua baiwa aisintone waimoiena.
40026021	Mo nana naio bedewe Iesu wane wanase, “Ne ulaipa dialedina, apana dea e bedelawo ne laga mampe nanalepie kotu apanawa mamposapi.”
40026022	Wawe alala aia ema etane mo nuau pareidaleno ita deadea Iesu waitarasane waienase, “Tatamba, ne dia, ba?”
40026023	Iesu sipoamone wanase, “Apana mida tauma bured wadene ne nata urai bedewe aneite naitana, me ipa sa ne wadanepie nanalepi.
40026024	Apana Otopa mampe epe segalepio bolepi, me umanawa buka bedewe girumaleno winedia rua. Tane me mida Apana Otopa dabuasapie laga mampe kotu apanawa mamposapia me matangela rebarebaida donsapie poka etepi! Poka sa etepia sawa eulena inawa me gamowa epona.”
40026025	Mape Iudas mida Iesu nanalepia wane wanase, “Debamana, mai ne, ba?” Iesu sipoasane wanase, “Mebaawa ipa e waiana.”
40026026	Mo nana naio Iesu bured wadene God auwasane ita ampuiasane wawe alala wanamodie wanase, “Wadane nana, ema ipa ne etena.”
40026027	Tauma me redu wadene God auwasane ita mo wanamodie wanase, “E uduudu ema nana.
40026028	Ema ipa ne osinana memenaubena apana uara kadiu insadabua baiwa. Inta ema bedewe ne sauana sanaa ulaipaleide.
40026029	Ne dialedina, nana ema naitana dialepio aupe ne wain mai napa, dia, ideita ne Mamana God gonaawa wisepie ipawanalepio tauma ne e do osowe nata.”
40026030	Nana aupe mo wadapos sasawa waieno dialeno Ierusalem ene nomone wadi Olib osowe anton.
40026031	Sape Iesu wawe alala diamone wanase, “Ande tadina e uduudu ne koaneane eneane aitanatuwapi buka girumalena rua. God buka bedewe ema epe wadi wadiase, ‘Ne sipsip onioniau apanawa epapabolepi ita sipsip auweie waimoia deaantoputuwapi.’
40026032	E uduudu ne eneane aitanatuwapio bonteapa. Tane bo bedewe enapawineape bautantape Galiliwa anteapo e wanawo wilene doineana.”
40026033	Pita sipoasane wanase, “Naita apana uduudu e koaepue ita eepu ne mai e koaepe eepa, dia.”
40026034	Iesu me aiawa leusane wanase, “Ne ulaipa dieedina, ande tadinawa eida ne wakoana wae lagaitaa walama natadea, muriwa kanka aiawa wapi.”
40026035	Tane Pita wane wanase, “Ne mai e wakoaepe lagaa wapa, diaida! Naita ne do boneapua, ide rua e nata bontata.” Tane wawe alala isiwa aia ipa deawaa waiena.
40026036	Tauma Iesu wawe alala do sala awopawe ebowa waia Gesemani bedewe wimone me mo diamone wanase, “E mape wanlempo ne sisi anteape rauparintapa.”
40026037	Iesu Pita ita Sebedi obampa nata otamone me do anton. Tane me nuawa pola wano ita nuapareidalene
40026038	mo diamone wanase, “Ne nuana nuapare nopeidosana bonepia rua etedina. Mape wanlempe ne do onioniantonte iwuntonte wainenta!”
40026039	Iesu eseanama alene dogo osowe dunelene rauparilene wanase, “Mako, rua ba dia, poka etaetala reduwa ne mainawoleidia e wade nambesawo ne mai napa? Tane mai ne menanedia rua dewasawo segalepi, dia, e insaisaaida segalepi ne mainawo.”
40026040	Tauma me leulene wisene wawe alala natadea ituntoio dommone ita Pita diene wanase, “E mai walama kampaida os ne do onioniantape iwuntepona rua, ba?”
40026041	Ita me do diamone wanase, “E rauparitonune emoitonune os wanlempa, rubu iompo e badowa enakasaitane nanausana rua, mai dia. E nuala uduudu menasadia badowa enonuna, tane ete oauaraleidie teinaaisileidia wankoaitonuna menasade.”
40026042	Iesu mo osowe emone alene rauparilene wanase, “Mamana, naita poka etaetala reduwa ema mai wadaaubea rua ne napa e insaisaa rua.”
40026043	Me leulene wisene wawe alala ituntoio dommon, ipawa mo emau lauidalen.
40026044	Mape Iesu mo emone alene raupariwa ompa deawaa wan.
40026045	Tane me raupariwa diasane leulene wawe alala mampo wisene diamone wanase, “E ideita ituitile bubuaitilana, ba? Ewana, ne walamanaida maidalen. Taumaida Apana Otopa dabuasapuo kadiwa dewalala witapolepi.
40026046	Enano ana, mida ne wadanepie nanalepia iede.”
40026047	Iesu gagaloleidioma Iudas wisen, me bauta wawe alala 12 bedeuwo dea. Apana uaraia witapo isima ita koinau otamone me do wimoiena. Apana sa uara pirisi debamau ita apana eiau waaubamoiena.
40026048	Ita mida Iesu nanalepia me bauta werego apana diaimaamone wanase, “Mida ne isuruasapino ewana, me ipa sa wadanaitudepi.”
40026049	Iudas wisene tauwadea Iesu mampelene wanase, “Debamana, ne auwaedina!” Me epe wane ita isuruasan.
40026050	Tane Iesu me diene wanase, “Sona, dima awa wiena dewasaa!” Tauma apana nomonaaubene Iesu wadanaitudeiena.
40026051	Iesu sowa dea dewa ema ewene isimawa teinenaubene pirisi debama nolawa dewalala dea epene ita me asiwa tonpunden.
40026052	Tane Iesu me diene wanase, “Isimaa leusae aupawe ane ea! Ipawa apana mida isimau teineiaubeia mo ona bedewe bontopu.
40026053	E ateiten ba dia, ne rua os Mamana mampe iririnteapono ita me tauwadea ensel uaraia waaubamopona ne baina?
40026054	Dima buka bedewe girumalena tauma ideita ulaipalepi, tane Mamana ensel waaubamopono dima buka bedewe girumalena ando ambi segalepona?”
40026055	Mape Iesu apana uara diamone wanase, “E isimala ita koinala do otele mainawo wilen wadaneana baiwa, ewaewawa abo ne witakadilala apanawa rua. Ne e do wainite walama ruawantedine God duwa bedewe waeuwantedine wainedine, tane e mai wadaneapona, dia.
40026056	Tane dewa ema uduudu segaleidia dima peroweta bukawa bedewe girumalena ulaipalepia baiwa.” Mape wawe alala uduudu tauwadea Iesu ene sauwo antonatuwaiena.
40026057	Anaana waeuwalala ita apana eiau pirisi ionoidoa ebowa Kaiapas duwa bedewe auwene waimoie ita mo mida Iesu wadanaitudeiena banlene antone apana debamau auweia bolawe wimoiena.
40026058	Mo Iesu banlene antoio Pita awoa Iesu wawe warorosane pirisi ionoidoa duwa enedia bolawa mampelene dima segalepio ewepia baiwa iwu apana do aisintone waimoie.
40026059	Tane pirisi debamau ita Ius onionialala uduudu laga apanawa banumoie. Apana sa laga mampe benemasikintopono mo Iesu bosapona baiwa.
40026060	Laga apanawa uara wimone Iesu benemasikiwantone tane mai kadiwa da donsapona Iesu bosapu. Tane kotu gagalowa ompa osowe apana nata mo uara danauwo enane
40026061	benemasikintone waienase, “Apana ema epe wane wanase, ‘Ne God duwa kadisapa ita walama natadea bedewe ne osowe wadapa.’”
40026062	Mape pirisi ionoidoa enenwisene Iesu diene wanase, “Apana ema e wawueie benemantoio eteiana, ba? E mo wawueia sipoa leusae eba inaitaa gagalowa waa, ba di epe enona?”
40026063	Tane Iesu dainakasalene mai dima wapona, dia. Tauma pirisi ionoidoa me diene wanase, “E Godida wanwankasalala ebowa mampe ulaipaida waa: Naita e Keriso God Otopa no dianewo atentata!”
40026064	Iesu leusane wanase, “E eba ipa sa waiana! Tane ne e uduudu dialedina: E ando Apana Otopa God mukamukaua witapa on deneuwe waimpo ita do uba giouwa asiasi iompo ewana.”
40026065	Mape pirisi ionoidoa nuawa kadiidaleno me garawa siolene wanase, “E uduudu etalana me God wakadisasano, dima baiwa benemasiki apanawa da baibuntitana?
40026066	Tauma e ambi inseilana no dima dewasata me mampe?” Mo sipoasane waienase, “Me epe wana baiwa ideita bolepi.”
40026067	Mape mo Iesu namba seseisaiena, apana isiwa witapo epaubasane ita isiwa me sainapa epane
40026068	wane waienase, “Naita e Kerisoewo dianea mida e epeedio poka eteiana!”
40026069	Pita kotu duwa enedia adiwe peloo wandio pirisi nolawa dewalala iwa rialene me mampelene diene wanase, “E do Galili Iesuwa do leilana apanawa!”
40026070	Tane Pita mo uduudu danauwo lagalene wanase, “Ne mai atenteapona e dima umanawa waiana.”
40026071	Ema aupe Pita nosene inta nope aleidio sape i da me ewene apana sape eneia diamone wanase, “Apana ema Nasaret Iesuwa do laia apanawa.”
40026072	Me osowe lagalene wanase, “Ne God ebowa mampe ulaipa wadina, apana sa ne mai atenteapona, dia!”
40026073	Ema aupe walama kerauda os bedewe apana sape eneia Pita mampentone diane waienase, “Ulaipa, e ipa Iesu sowa dea, e aiaa bumpa etaeta sabamoede!”
40026074	Pita meba ula wane wanase, “Ne laganteapono God matangelaneapona, apana sa ne mai atenteapona, dia!” Pita ema wano dialeno kanka aiawa wan.
40026075	Tane Pita insendewalen dima Iesu bauta wane wanase, “E ne wakoana wae lagaitaa walama natadea, muriwa kanka aiawa wapi.” Ita Pita nuawa pareidaleno nosene peloo alene ke debamaia wan.
40027001	Tadinaida pirisi debamau ita apana eiau auwene gagalontone insaisau deasaiena Iesu bosapu.
40027002	Mo Iesu witapa taune banlene antone Rom gabemaniwa debama Pailat witapesaiena.
40027003	Iudas mida Iesu nanalena tauma atenlen Iesu kotuwa aleidia ompa osowe bolepi. Sa baiwa me kadiwa dewasana atenlene nuawa polaida wano silwa nepa 30 pirisi debamau ita apana eiau me waneiena wadene mane sa leusapie wanamopia baiwa alen.
40027004	Me mo mampo wisene diamone wanase, “Ne kadiwaida dewasane apana eudida nanantena bolepi!” Mo sipoasane waienase, “Dima baiwa no nuamba pola wapi, sa e kadia, no mai wasaueta, dabuanen!”
40027005	Iudas aia ema etene me mane mukalene God duwa bedewe aubamone emone nosene alene ita meba tautaulen.
40027006	Pirisi debamau mane sa otamone waienase, “Mane ema osina wadawadala! No anaanamba bedewe mai eulepona mane ema God duwa manewa do deasata!”
40027007	Mo gagalontone insaisau deasane mane sa wadane apana onta dewala dogowa moawa gimaranton bola da apanawa bontompo sape dobosamompaa baiwa.
40027008	Ema segalena baiwa walama sawo ita ando apana dogo moawa sa ebowa wampaase, ‘Osina dogowa.’
40027009	Dewa ema dima peroweta Ieremaia wana ulaipalepia baiwa segalen. Me epe wane wanase, “Israel apanawa isiwa nuau deasaiena ita silwa nepa 30 malesasaiena me wadapua baiwa.
40027010	Mo mane sa wadane ita apana onta dewala dogowa moawa gimarantoiena, Tatamba God dianena rua.”
40027011	Mo Iesu wadane Rom gabemaniwa debama mampe wimoieno ita me Iesu waitarasane wanase, “E Iuswa warereu, ba?” Iesu leusane wanase, “E ipa sa waiana!”
40027012	Pirisi debamau ita apana eiau Iesu wawusaiena tane Iesu mai gagalo da leusapona, dia.
40027013	Mape Pailat me diene wanase, “E wawua gagalowa uara waio eteiana, ba dia?”
40027014	Tane Iesu wawusaio me daina enakasalen, mai gagalo da wapona, dia. Ita Pailat Iesu dainawa enedio ewene memesaidalen.
40027015	Pailat me dewawa rua Pasowa odawa walamawe ena deadea bedewe apana diburala dea Iuswa sonabeia dibura bedewe wadediaubedio nosedi aleide.
40027016	Walama sawo witakadilala Barabas ebowa alala dibura bedewe wandie.
40027017	Pailat apana uaraia sape auweiena waitaramone wanase, “Mida menaledia e baila wapaaubepo alepi, Barabas ba Iesu, mida me umanawa waia me ipa Keriso God sauawalena?”
40027018	Tane Pailat atenidalen pirisi debamau Iesu obusane baiwa di wadane me witapesaiena.
40027019	Pailat kotu duwa bedewe wandio manainapa gagalo wanaubene wanase, “Mai apana eudida sa mampe kotu bedewe dewa da dewasaa, ipawa ne tadino me auwesane meraunten.”
40027020	Tane pirisi debamau ita apana eiau apana uaraia waninamoiena mo Pailat iririsapuo Barabas wadepiaubepio inalepi, ita me Iesu bosapi.
40027021	Ita Pailat apana waitaramone wanase, “Apana ema nata bedeuwo mida menaledia ne e baila wapaaubepo inalepi?” Mo sipoasane waienase, “Barabas!”
40027022	Ita Pailat mo waitaramone wanase, “Tauma ne dima dewasapa Iesu mampe, mida umanawa apana waia me ipa Keriso?” Mo uduudu leusane waienase, “Koros osowe bosaa!”
40027023	Ita Pailat osowe waitaramone wanase, “Me kadi dainea dewasana bowalepi?” Tane mo osowe rasa debamaia wane waienase, “Koros osowe bosaa!”
40027024	Pailat atenlen me gagalo wanlewalen, ita ona segalepia sawa apana uara danauwo me esa wadene witapa mitene aupe wanase, “Apana ema osinawa mai ne witanawo, dia! E witalawo!”
